LanguageData.EldenRim_GuldenForest_Enable_CropEating: Enable wild rabbitgaroos eating sown plants.
LanguageData.EldenRim_GuldenForest_Range_CropEating: The radius that rabbitgaroos will notice sown plants within.
LanguageData.EldenRim_GuldenForest_LockAurelianStone: Aurelian Stone only appears on Gulden Biome (Requires restart)
LanguageData.EldenRim_GuldenForest_LockAurelianStoneT: Note: Not all tiles will have Aurelien Stone.\nTurning this setting on mid-game can change a maps current stone chunks but should not otherwise impact it.
